titleStmt.title: A petition from the City of London with a covenant in the name of divers collonels, and other officers, and apprentices, and sea-men; for the raising of forces against the army, and bringing the King to London. VVith the votes of the House of Commons concerning the said petition. And the Parliaments message to the Lord Mayor about the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
